original_text: Then he shall take some holy water in a clay jar and put some dust from the tabernacle floor into the water.
korean_text: 토기에 거룩한 물을 담고 성막 바닥의 티끌을 취하여 물에 넣고

sentences.original_text: Then he shall take some holy water
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 거룩한 물을 조금 가져와서

sentences.original_text: and put some dust from the tabernacle floor
